remittanceNumber.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of the remittance document

documentType.description: Specifies a type of financial or commercial document. Possible values are: MeteredServiceInvoice, CreditNoteRelatedToFinancialAdjustment, DebitNoteRelatedToFinancialAdjustment, CommercialInvoice, CreditNote, DebitNote, HireInvoice, SelfBilledInvoice, CommercialContract, StatementOfAccount, DispatchAdvice, BillOfLading, Voucher, AccountReceivableOpenItem, TradeServicesUtilityTransaction, PurchaseOrded

RemittanceInformation.description: Information supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system.
